GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an object containing an articles property containing array of articles and a default pagination limit of 10, and a a total_count property counting total number of articles within the db

POST /api/articles.description: adds an article to the database

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves article object of the specified article id

exampleResponse.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch
exampleResponse.author: icellusedkars

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves comments on article with specified article id

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts comments on article with specified article id and responds with the posted comment as a string

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates article votes with the specified number of votes in a vote object

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: removes comment with the specified comment id

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/users/:user_id.description: serves an array containing user_obj with the information on the user with the specified username
